name: Icarus Fall
description:
Icarus Fall is a fun little game I made while I was a student at University, I brought some friends on board to help with the development also. It isn't perfect and has some bugs but if you are looking for a quick 5 minutes of fun then playing this game from start to finish can be entertaining. :) 

Icarus Fall is a retelling of the famous story of Icarus and how he become a legend for flying to close to the sun on wings made of feathers and wax. 

NOTE: 

Use Arrow Keys for movement and Dash and if Icarus gets knocked of course use Space-bar to re align him or slowdown.
